Reinisch1893 #325. [MAKE BETTER SYSTEMATIZATION OF RʔS ANALYSIS OF DERIVED STEMS.]In Reinisch,causPass is termed causatives reflexive;some instances of passCaus are termed reciprocum;passCaus2 is causatives reciprocum.
